reviewTimeLines.summary: FAB-2117: Bug - Availability Starting From

comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment: Javadoc very hard to follow vs actual code....can we chat next week about re-writing javadoc?

comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment: AvailabilityStartingFromBasisValidationRule.validateStartingFromBasis() and AvailabilityStartingFromPeriodValidationRule.validateStartingFromPeriod() are identical as far as I can see? Is this an error?

comments.author: Alberto Galende
comments.comment: Starting From Period and Starting from Basis are both Deferred Validation (see Leave Plan Validation feature A03-F07). In both cases we have to test the same condition, is the same, but for one we are testing the Day and in the other case we are testing the Month. Maybe I can create an Abstract class to store the private method validateStartingFromPeriod(). We can talk about this.

comments.author: Alberto Galende
comments.comment: As we talk, I just leave it as it is instead of creating a new Abstract class.

comments.author: Trevor Higgins
